author: wn.com
title: EU referendum: David Cameron will never campaign to leave the bloc, says Lord Heseltin
text: David Cameron will never campaign to leave the European Union even though he has threatened to call for an Out vote in the referendum, Lord Heseltine has suggested. The Conservative former Deputy Prime Minister , a prominent pro-European,
